name: I Need Your Advice...
description: Julius is unpredictable, rude, and needy to say the least. However, he needs your advice on how to handle a difficult relationship with a long time rival. The evil yet misunderstood Ronald has been causing Julius trouble ever since they met in elementary school.  The relationship between the two is complicated and frustrating, which is why Julius needs your  guidance on how to handle it. From cleaning Julius's poops to making sure he is fed, you will embark on a journey that will test your patience while strengthening a bond you would have never imagined having.
